text: Barry Moore (born September 26, 1966) is an American politician who is the representative for Alabama's 1st congressional district in the House of Representatives. Barry is a Republican and has been a United States Representative since 2021. He represented Alabama's 2nd congressional district from 2021 to 2025. He first tried to get elected in 2018 but lost in the primary election. Moore was first a state senator for Alabama's 91st district in 2010. In 2014 he was arrested because he lied to police but Barry was not punished. Moore joined 147 House of Representatives Republicans to try to get rid of the 2020 United States presidential election results. ==Election history== ; 2018 United States House of Representatives election, 2nd Congressional District ; 2020 United States House of Representatives election, 2nd Congressional District ==References== Category:1966 births Category:United States representatives from Alabama Category:People from Enterprise, Alabama Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Living people Category:Members of the Alabama Legislature
title: Barry Moore (Alabama politician)
